description: Barrie Police Need Backup Testimony To South End Incident
maintext: Barrie Police hoping someone can help shed light on a road rage incident in the south end. Officers say a coupe and SUV were involved in a feud of some kind in the Veterans Drive and Caplan Avenue area of town around 9:00 Tuesday morning. A small black car may have also been involved here. Police are hoping the driver of that black car or anyone who witnessed the interaction, give them a call. Contact Constable Watt of the Barrie Police Service at 705-725-7025 ext. 2942 or email at jwatt@barriepolice.ca. Any information can be provided anonymously to Crime Stoppers at 1-800-222-TIPS or leave an anonymous tip online at www.tipsubmit.com
title: Road Rage Witnesses Wanted
